title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.21 - Optional Movement Lane Control Sign (R3-6)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.21 - Optional Movement Lane Control Sign (R3-6)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 07. INSERT the following paragraphs: Option: 00A The NYR3-27 and NYR3-28 signs (see Sign Drawing SD-R4)
may be used to indicate movements permitted from a specific lane. Standard: 00B If used, the NYR3-27 and NYR3-28 signs shall be used in
a manner similar to the R3-6 sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
